alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 6:49AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Johnson, southern Tarrant and southwestern Dallas Counties through 715 AM CST... At 649 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Godley, or near Joshua, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Cedar Hill, Burleson, Cleburne, Crowley, Forest Hill, Kennedale, Everman, Joshua, Alvarado, Rendon, Ovilla, Edgecliff Village, Pantego, Godley, Cross Timber and Cedar Hill State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 29 and 46. Interstate 20 between mile markers 435 and 456. Interstate 30 between mile markers 26 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
